title: Reflection - incident ray 70 degrees from surface

content.question: A ray of light is incident on a plane mirror at an angle of <math alttext="70 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>70</mn><mo>°</mo></math> from the mirror’s surface, as shown in the figure. What is the angle of reflection as measured between the normal to the mirror's surface and the reflected ray?
